overview_of_class: MAT SCI 401 A graduate course in classical and statistical thermodynamics. The following topics in classical thermodynamics will be covered: the laws of thermodynamics; conditions for equilibrium; solutions; excess quantities; binary and ternary phase diagrams. Additionally, the following topics in statistical thermodynamics will not be covered: statisticl definition of entropy; ensembles and the Boltzmann and Gibbs distributions; quantum and classical ideal gasses; and the regular solution model.
name: Chemical & Statistical Thermodynamics of Materials
subject: MAT_SCI
